channel.title: King Ability "Into the Tower"
channel.description:
So, we where brainstorming in Derps chat.
How about a new day ability for the king called "Drag him away" or the like.
How it works:
- Useable at day - Target: any player alive - Targeted player gets removed from chat immediatelly and has to spend the whole following night in Jail/the tower. - counts as occupied - All normal jail interactions that don´t depend on Prince still aply - Anouncement in chat that player X gets dragged away to the tower.
Maybe add three charges or a one day cooldown so king can not abuse it.
This abiltity should help to give King more authority so people think twice about beeing anoying in chat (looking at you fool) or pissing of the king ("King, Leads!?!?", "Evil king!").
Aditional sugestions:
- If you jail royal blood you use this ability afterwards (Noble blood still spends the night in tower) - Some kinda kill ability to execute the person in the tower.
Fears: Might be booring for the person thrown into tower (but hey, it should be a penalty for pissing of the king) Maybe makes the prince feel less unique
Thank you for your consideration :)

item.title: King Ability "Into the Tower"
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
LeelandGrant:

So, we are brainstorming in Derps chat.

And we came up with:“How about a new day ability for the king called “Drag him away” or something similar to that?”

How it works:

  • Usable at day
  • Can target any player alive
  • Targeted player gets removed from chat immediately and has to spent the whole following night in the jail(tower).
  • Ability counts as occupied
  • Jail interaction are basically the same as Prince
  • Automatically announce in chat that player X get dragged away to the tower upon targeting one player.

Maybe limited as three charges or a one day cooldown so king can not abuse it.

This abiltity should help to give King more authority so people think twice about being annoying in chat (looking at you fool) or pissing the king (“King, Leads!?!?”, “Evil king!”).

Additional sugestions:

  • If you jail royal blood, you will lose this ability afterwards (Noble blood still spends the night in tower)
  • Add kill ability to execute the person in the tower.

Cons:

Might be too boring for the person thrown into tower (but hey, it should be a penalty for pissing of the king)

Maybe makes the prince feel less unique

Thank you for your consideration
